subject: Hi,
body:
Hi,
I'm Rita, I'm 36 years old and I'm from Germany
My late husband is from Hanoi Vietnam and I live in the UK,
I have a New Year offer for you, please get back for more details.....

subject: Re:   Hi,
body:
Hello Rita,

It's nice to meet you! I'm sorry to hear about your late husband. It sounds like he had quite an international background, being from Vietnam and living in the UK. 

You mentioned a New Year offer? That sounds interesting. Could you tell me more about it?

Best wishes,
James

subject: Details, please reply
body:
Dear James,

My name is Rita Kil Opah from Germany.

Yes, I have a Christmas/New Year gift of $2M dollars for you. I decided to
give you this after my recent health scan result showed that I have been
diagnosed with blood cancer leading to leukemia and stand a chance of
living or dying before the end of this month.

I witnessed a case where a relative of mine died and instead of the bank
handing over their estates and wealth to the immediate family requested for
some useless documents which at the end of the day they could not provide
and the bank seized their money.

I do not want such a thing to happen to me because I do not have children
and my husband is late. Please kindly accept this money from me and use it
to set up a foundation for helping the poor people around you and then use
your good heart and take whatever you want to take for the upkeep of your
family.

I got your contact from an email database and believe me, i do not know you
but believe you have a good heart. It does not matter if you are a man or a
woman, whether you are rich or poor, or if you are a christian or a muslim,
all i need is a generous person with a heart of gold.

Please, my dear, get back to me with your personal information if you are
willing to do this for me so that I can get your name on my "will" paper
and submit it to the bank to release the money to you. We really need to
complete this business by next week while I am still alive, so please I
would like you to always check your email everyday and follow up with me.

My pictures are attached to this mail.

Thank you for helping me.

Rita

subject: Re: Details, please reply
body:
Hello Rita,

I'm deeply sorry to hear about your health condition. It must be a challenging time for you. I admire your courage and generosity in wanting to help others even in such difficult circumstances.

Your idea of setting up a foundation to help the poor is truly commendable. However, I would like to know more about this project. Could you please provide more details? For instance, what kind of projects do you envision this foundation undertaking? Are there any specific communities or causes that you are particularly passionate about?

Also, I understand that you want to complete this process as soon as possible, but it's important for me to ensure that everything is done correctly and legally. Could you please share more information about the legal procedures involved in transferring the funds and setting up the foundation?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: As requested
body:
Dear James,

Thank you for the reply, I appreciate your prayers for me.

I do not have any particular place for setting up the charity foundation.
You can do that within your community, all that I am concerned about is
that we have people in need everywhere.

As part of the legal back up, I will be including your name in my "Will of
testament" that legally certifies you as the only person to claim and
receive the money from the bank where it is deposited. Then the bank can
proceed with you.

All you need to do now so that we can kick off is for you to provide me
with your personal information.

Your full name
Your address
Your whatsapp phone number

These will be used to document the paperwork which copy will also be
forwarded to you and the contact of the bank to proceed with them.

Let's move on immediately.

Rita

subject: Re: As requested
body:
Hello Rita,

Thank you so much for your kind response and the trust you've placed in me. I'm really touched by your generosity and willingness to help those in need.

I'm curious about how this process works. Could you please explain a bit more about how the money will be transferred? Also, what kind of charity work do you envision this money being used for?

As for my personal details, I'd prefer to keep them private at this stage until I understand more about the process. I hope that's okay with you.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
James
